text:
Hey <@U7D5W6EVA>, apologies for the delayed reply.   The process of moving the coded files such as themes, templates etc is a relatively painless experience using the CLI.    I would not rely on the cms sandbox for moving page content however.
I would recommend looking into <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/website-pages/redesign-and-relaunch-your-site-with-content-staging|content staging>
